articles.author: Lauren M. Johnson, CNN
articles.title: Appalachian Trail Conservancy asks hikers to delay long trips due to Covid-19
articles.description: For those who have hiking the Appalachian Trail (AT) on their bucket list for the year, Covid-19 may prove to be an unexpected complication.

articles.author: Chris Isidore, CNN Business
articles.title: Tesla disappoints Wall Street despite strong profits
articles.description: Tesla capped its breakout year with a record profit that still fell short of analysts forecasts, sending its shares lower in after-hours trading.

articles.author: Kaya Yurieff, CNN Business
articles.title: Facebook profit jumped 53% amid growing scrutiny
articles.description: Facebook's business continues to fire on all cylinders even as the company faces growing scrutiny from regulators over its acquisitions and from critics for the role its platform may have played in spreading lies about the US presidential election.

articles.author: Ryan Nobles and Jeff Zeleny, CNN
articles.title: Trump to meet with McCarthy in Florida on Thursday
articles.description: Former President Donald Trump is expected to meet with House Minority Leader Kevin McCarthy in Florida on Thursday, a source connected to the former President confirms to CNN.

articles.author: Claudia Rebaza, Jimena De la Quintana and Tara John, CNN
articles.title: Peru orders lockdowns amid crippling second Covid-19 wave
articles.description: Peru has announced new lockdowns for 10 of its 25 regions, including the capital Lima, as Covid-19 cases rise and hospitals reach a breaking point. The lockdowns will start on January 31.

articles.author: Paul LeBlanc, CNN
articles.title: Biden signed two executive orders and a memorandum Wednesday. Here's what they do
articles.description: President Joe Biden on Wednesday continued his executive action blitz with a package of orders aimed at addressing the climate crisis along with a new memorandum on scientific integrity.

articles.title: Senator accused of mischaracterizing his military service
articles.description: CNN's Brianna Keilar reports on accusations that Sen. Tom Cotton (R-AR) mischaracterized his military service by claiming he was a ranger when he is only ranger qualified.

articles.author: Lauren M. Johnson, CNN
articles.title: UC Berkeley removes the name on a school building over an anthropologist's controversial past
articles.description: The University of California, Berkeley has removed the name on its anthropology building, Kroeber Hall -- named for prominent American anthropologist Alfred Kroeber -- because of his controversial history with Native Americans.

articles.author: Jen Christensen, CNN
articles.title: CDC doesn't know if new Covid-19 variants are causing rare complication in children
articles.description: Public health officials are trying to learn if new Covid-19 variants are causing more cases of a rare complication in children called multisystem inflammatory syndrome, which can cause heart damage. Many MIS-C cases follow Covid-19 infections with no symptoms.

articles.title: Jordan Belfort: GameStop frenzy is a 'modified pump and dump'
articles.description: "Wolf of Wall Street" author Jordan Belfort discusses GameStop's stock surge and what it means for Wall Street investors.

articles.title: The GOP's 20 reasons why there shouldn't be impeachment trial
articles.description: CNN's Brianna Keilar breaks down 20 of the GOP's arguments against an impeachment trial of former President Donald Trump.

articles.author: Kylie Atwood and Jennifer Hansler, CNN
articles.title: Biden administration pauses arms sales to Saudi Arabia and UAE, sources say
articles.description: The Biden administration has paused arms sales to Saudi Arabia and the United Arab Emirates as it conducts a wider review of agreements worth billions of dollars made by the Trump administration, sources familiar with the matter told CNN Wednesday.

articles.author: Simret Aklilu, CNN
articles.title: This artist just became the first Native American to win the Caldecott Medal for children's book illustration
articles.description: Michaela Goade won the Caldecott Medal for her illustrations in the children's book "We Are Water Protectors," written by Carole Lindstrom.

articles.title: GOP plans to filibuster Mayorkas nomination for DHS secretary

articles.title: Man pleads guilty in plot to kidnap Michigan Gov. Gretchen Whitmer

articles.title: Threats against lawmakers fuel safety concerns for travel outside Washington
articles.description: As threats continue to mount against members of Congress, concern is growing about the safety of some lawmakers when they travel outside Washington and the security bubble it provides, multiple sources told CNN.

articles.author: Daniel Dale
articles.title: Fact check: Jim Jordan falsely claims Biden ordered the release of all undocumented immigrants
articles.description: President Joe Biden has already ordered significant changes to US immigration policy. But he has not issued an order that Republican Ohio Rep. Jim Jordan claims he did.
